headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for NoLongerEvil Nest thermostats. Get your API key from your [NoLongerEvil account settings](https://nolongerevil.com/settings).

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your NoLongerEvil API key. Create one in Settings > API Keys with 'read' and 'write' scopes.

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval (seconds)
pollInterval.description: How often to poll the thermostat for status updates. Minimum 15 seconds due to API rate limits.
